title: Democratizing nanotech, then and now
title_cn: 过去和现在使纳米技术民主化

title: Our choice from the recent literature
title_cn: 我们从最近的文献中选择

title: Nanoparticles in the real world
title_cn: 现实世界中的纳米粒子

title: Nanopore sensors for nucleic acid analysis
title_cn: 用于核酸分析的纳米孔传感器
abstract: Nanopore analysis is an emerging technique that involves using a voltage to drive molecules through a nanoscale pore in a membrane between two electrolytes, and monitoring how the ionic current through the nanopore changes as single molecules pass through it. This approach allows charged polymers (including single-stranded DNA, double-stranded DNA and RNA) to be analysed with subnanometre resolution and without the need for labels or amplification. Recent advances suggest that nanopore-based sensors could be competitive with other third-generation DNA sequencing technologies, and may be able to rapidly and reliably sequence the human genome for under $1,000. In this article we review the use of nanopore technology in DNA sequencing, genetics and medical diagnostics.
abstract_cn: 纳米孔分析是一种新兴技术，涉及使用电压驱动分子穿过两个电解质之间的膜中的纳米级孔，并监控通过纳米孔的离子电流如何随着单个分子通过而发生变化。 这种方法允许带电荷的聚合物（包括单链DNA，双链DNA和RNA）以亚纳米级的分辨率进行分析，而无需标记或扩增。 最近的进展表明，基于纳米孔的传感器可以与其他第三代DNA测序技术竞争，并且可以以不到1000美元的价格对人类基因组进行快速可靠的测序。 在本文中，我们回顾了纳米孔技术在DNA测序，遗传学和医学诊断中的应用。</ p>

title: Experimental demonstration of a single-molecule electric motor
title_cn: 单分子电动机的实验演示
abstract: For molecules to be used as components in molecular machines, methods that couple individual molecules to external energy sources and that selectively excite motion in a given direction are required. Significant progress has been made in the construction of molecular motors powered by light and by chemical reactions, but electrically driven motors have not yet been built, despite several theoretical proposals for such motors. Here we report that a butyl methyl sulphide molecule adsorbed on a copper surface can be operated as a single-molecule electric motor. Electrons from a scanning tunnelling microscope are used to drive the directional motion of the molecule in a two-terminal setup. Moreover, the temperature and electron flux can be adjusted to allow each rotational event to be monitored at the molecular scale in real time. The direction and rate of the rotation are related to the chiralities of both the molecule and the tip of the microscope (which serves as the electrode), illustrating the importance of the symmetry of the metal contacts in atomic-scale electrical devices.
abstract_cn: 对于要用作分子机器组件的分子，需要将单个分子耦合到外部能源并选择性地沿给定方向激发运动的方法。在由光和化学反应驱动的分子电动机的构造上已经取得了重大进展，但是尽管有一些关于电动机的理论建议，但尚未制造出电动电动机。在这里，我们报告说，吸附在铜表面的丁基甲基硫化物分子可以作为单分子电动机运行。来自扫描隧道显微镜的电子用于驱动分子在两个末端设置的定向运动。而且，可以调节温度和电子通量以允许以分子规模实时监测每个旋转事件。旋转的方向和速率与分子和显微镜尖端（用作电极）的手性有关，这说明了原子级电气设备中金属触点对称的重要性。</ p >

title: Graphene plasmonics for tunable terahertz metamaterials
title_cn: 可调谐太赫兹超材料的石墨烯等离子体
abstract: Plasmons describe collective oscillations of electrons. They have a fundamental role in the dynamic responses of electron systems and form the basis of research into optical metamaterials. Plasmons of two-dimensional massless electrons, as present in graphene, show unusual behaviour that enables new tunable plasmonic metamaterials and, potentially, optoelectronic applications in the terahertz frequency range. Here we explore plasmon excitations in engineered graphene micro-ribbon arrays. We demonstrate that graphene plasmon resonances can be tuned over a broad terahertz frequency range by changing micro-ribbon width and in situ electrostatic doping. The ribbon width and carrier doping dependences of graphene plasmon frequency demonstrate power-law behaviour characteristic of two-dimensional massless Dirac electrons. The plasmon resonances have remarkably large oscillator strengths, resulting in prominent room-temperature optical absorption peaks. In comparison, plasmon absorption in a conventional two-dimensional electron gas was observed only at 4.2 K (refs). The results represent a first look at light–plasmon coupling in graphene and point to potential graphene-based terahertz metamaterials.
abstract_cn: 等离子体描述电子的集体振动。它们在电子系统的动态响应中具有基本作用，并构成了光学超材料的研究基础。石墨烯中存在的二维无质量电子的等离激元显示出异常的行为，从而使新型可调谐等离子超材料得以实现，并有可能在太赫兹频率范围内实现光电应用。在这里，我们探索了工程石墨烯微带阵列中的等离激元激发。我们证明，通过改变微带宽度和原位静电掺杂，可以在很宽的太赫兹频率范围内调节石墨烯等离子体激元共振。石墨烯等离激元频率的带宽度和载流子掺杂依赖性证明了二维无质量狄拉克电子的幂律行为特征。等离子体共振具有非常大的振荡器强度，导致显着的室温光吸收峰。相比之下，常规二维电子气中的等离激元吸收仅在4.2K（参考）下观察到。结果代表了对石墨烯中光等离子体耦合的首次观察，并指出了潜在的基于石墨烯的太赫兹超材料。</ p>

title: Direct observation of a propagating spin wave induced by spin-transfer torque
title_cn: 直接观察自旋传递扭矩引起的传播自旋波
abstract: Spin torque oscillators with nanoscale electrical contacts are able to produce coherent spin waves in extended magnetic films, and offer an attractive combination of electrical and magnetic field control, broadband operation, fast spin-wave frequency modulation, and the possibility of synchronizing multiple spin-wave injection sites. However, many potential applications rely on propagating (as opposed to localized) spin waves, and direct evidence for propagation has been lacking. Here, we directly observe a propagating spin wave launched from a spin torque oscillator with a nanoscale electrical contact into an extended Permalloy (nickel iron) film through the spin transfer torque effect. The data, obtained by wave-vector-resolved micro-focused Brillouin light scattering, show that spin waves with tunable frequencies can propagate for several micrometres. Micromagnetic simulations provide the theoretical support to quantitatively reproduce the results.
abstract_cn: 具有纳米级电触点的自旋扭矩振荡器能够在扩展的磁性膜中产生相干自旋波，并提供了电场和磁场控制，宽带运行，快速自旋波频率调制以及同步多个 自旋波注入部位。 但是，许多潜在的应用都依赖于传播的（而不是局部的）自旋波，并且缺乏直接的传播证据。 在这里，我们直接观察到自旋扭矩振荡器与纳米级电接触通过自旋传递扭矩效应传播到扩展的坡莫合金（镍铁）薄膜中的传播自旋波。 通过波矢量分辨的微聚焦布里渊光散射获得的数据表明，具有可调频率的自旋波可以传播数微米。 微观磁模拟为定量再现结果提供了理论支持。

title: Gold nanoparticles for high-throughput genotyping of long-range haplotypes
title_cn: 金纳米颗粒用于长单倍型高通量基因分型
abstract: Completion of the Human Genome Project and the HapMap Project has led to increasing demands for mapping complex traits in humans to understand the aetiology of diseases. Identifying variations in the DNA sequence, which affect how we develop disease and respond to pathogens and drugs, is important for this purpose, but it is difficult to identify these variations in large sample sets. Here we show that through a combination of capillary sequencing and polymerase chain reaction assisted by gold nanoparticles, it is possible to identify several DNA variations that are associated with age-related macular degeneration and psoriasis on significant regions of human genomic DNA. Our method is accurate and promising for large-scale and high-throughput genetic analysis of susceptibility towards disease and drug resistance.
abstract_cn: 人类基因组计划和HapMap项目的完成，导致对人类复杂特征作图以了解疾病病因的需求不断增加。 识别影响我们发展疾病以及对病原体和药物的反应方式的DNA序列变异对于此目的很重要，但要在大型样本集中鉴定这些变异是困难的。 在这里我们表明，通过毛细管测序和金纳米颗粒辅助的聚合酶链反应的结合，可以鉴定与年龄相关的黄斑变性和人类基因组DNA重要区域的牛皮癣相关的几种DNA变异。 该方法对疾病和耐药性的大规模，高通量遗传分析具有准确性和前景。

title: Alpha-alumina nanoparticles induce efficient autophagy-dependent cross-presentation and potent antitumour response
title_cn: α-氧化铝纳米颗粒诱导有效的自噬依赖性交叉呈递和有效的抗肿瘤反应
abstract: Therapeutic cancer vaccination is an attractive strategy because it induces T cells of the immune system to recognize and kill tumour cells in cancer patients. However, it remains difficult to generate large numbers of T cells that can recognize the antigens on cancer cells using conventional vaccine carrier systems. Here we show that α-Al2O3 nanoparticles can act as an antigen carrier to reduce the amount of antigen required to activate T cells in vitro and in vivo. We found that α-Al2O3 nanoparticles delivered antigens to autophagosomes in dendritic cells, which then presented the antigens to T cells through autophagy. Immunization of mice with α-Al2O3 nanoparticles that are conjugated to either a model tumour antigen or autophagosomes derived from tumour cells resulted in tumour regression. These results suggest that α-Al2O3 nanoparticles may be a promising adjuvant in the development of therapeutic cancer vaccines.
abstract_cn: 治疗性癌症疫苗接种是一种有吸引力的策略，因为它诱导免疫系统的T细胞识别并杀死癌症患者中的肿瘤细胞。然而，使用常规的疫苗载体系统仍然难以产生能够识别癌细胞上的抗原的大量T细胞。在这里，我们显示了＆＃945; -Al 2 O 3 纳米颗粒可以充当抗原载体，从而减少体内和体外激活T细胞所需的抗原量。我们发现＆＃945; -Al 2 O 3 纳米颗粒将抗原递送到树突状细胞中的自噬体，然后通过自噬将抗原呈递给T细胞。用与模型肿瘤抗原或衍生自肿瘤细胞的自噬体偶联的＆＃945; -Al 2 O 3 纳米粒子对小鼠进行免疫，可导致肿瘤消退。这些结果表明，＆＃945; -Al 2 O 3 纳米颗粒可能是开发治疗性癌症疫苗的有希望的佐剂。

title: Graphene oxide windows for in situ environmental cell photoelectron spectroscopy
title_cn: 石墨烯氧化物窗口用于原位环境电池光电子能谱
abstract: The performance of new materials and devices often depends on processes taking place at the interface between an active solid element and the environment (such as air, water or other fluids). Understanding and controlling such interfacial processes require surface-specific spectroscopic information acquired under real-world operating conditions, which can be challenging because standard approaches such as X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy generally require high-vacuum conditions. The state-of-the-art approach to this problem relies on unique and expensive apparatus including electron analysers coupled with sophisticated differentially pumped lenses. Here, we develop a simple environmental cell with graphene oxide windows that are transparent to low-energy electrons (down to 400 eV), and demonstrate the feasibility of X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy measurements on model samples such as gold nanoparticles and aqueous salt solution placed on the back side of a window. These proof-of-principle results show the potential of using graphene oxide, graphene and other emerging ultrathin membrane windows for the fabrication of low-cost, single-use environmental cells compatible with commercial X-ray and Auger microprobes as well as scanning or transmission electron microscopes.
abstract_cn: 新材料和新设备的性能通常取决于在活性固体元素和环境（例如空气，水或其他流体）之间的界面处发生的过程。理解和控制这种界面过程需要在实际操作条件下获取特定于表面的光谱信息，这可能是具有挑战性的，因为诸如X射线光电子能谱之类的标准方法通常需要高真空条件。解决此问题的最新方法依赖于独特且昂贵的设备，包括电子分析仪和精密的差动泵透镜。在这里，我们开发了一个简单的环境单元，该单元具有对低能电子（低至400＆＃160eV）透明的氧化石墨烯窗口，并演示了对模型样品（如金纳米颗粒和水溶液）进行X射线光电子能谱测量的可行性盐溶液放在窗户的背面。这些原理验证的结果表明，使用氧化石墨烯，石墨烯和其他新兴的超薄膜窗口制造与商业X射线和俄歇微探针兼容的低成本，一次性使用环境电池以及扫描或透射的潜力电子显微镜。

title: Thermodynamically stable RNA three-way junction for constructing multifunctional nanoparticles for delivery of therapeutics
title_cn: 热力学稳定的RNA三向连接，用于构建多功能纳米颗粒，用于治疗剂的输送
abstract: RNA nanoparticles have applications in the treatment of cancers and viral infection; however, the instability of RNA nanoparticles has hindered their development for therapeutic applications. The lack of covalent linkage or crosslinking in nanoparticles causes dissociation in vivo. Here we show that the packaging RNA of bacteriophage phi29 DNA packaging motor can be assembled from 3–6 pieces of RNA oligomers without the use of metal salts. Each RNA oligomer contains a functional module that can be a receptor-binding ligand, aptamer, short interfering RNA or ribozyme. When mixed together, they self-assemble into thermodynamically stable tri-star nanoparticles with a three-way junction core. These nanoparticles are resistant to 8 M urea denaturation, are stable in serum and remain intact at extremely low concentrations. The modules remain functional in vitro and in vivo, suggesting that the three-way junction core can be used as a platform for building a variety of multifunctional nanoparticles. We studied 25 different three-way junction motifs in biological RNA and found only one other motif that shares characteristics similar to the three-way junction of phi29 pRNA.
abstract_cn: RNA纳米颗粒可用于治疗癌症和病毒感染。然而，RNA纳米粒子的不稳定性阻碍了其在治疗应用中的发展。纳米粒子中缺乏共价键或交联会导致体内解离。在这里，我们表明噬菌体phi29 DNA包装马达的包装RNA可以从3个6号RNA低聚物组装而无需使用金属盐。每个RNA低聚物都包含一个功能模块，该模块可以是受体结合配体，适体，短干扰RNA或核酶。当混合在一起时，它们会自组装成具有三向结核的热力学稳定的三星纳米颗粒。这些纳米颗粒可抵抗8 M尿素变性，在血清中稳定，并且在极低的浓度下仍保持完整。该模块在体外和体内均保持功能，这表明三向连接核可以用作构建各种多功能纳米粒子的平台。我们研究了生物RNA中的25种不同的三向连接基序，仅发现了一个与phi29 pRNA的三向连接相似的基序。</ p>

title: Nanopore-based detection of circulating microRNAs in lung cancer patients
title_cn: 基于纳米孔的肺癌患者循环microRNA检测
abstract: MicroRNAs are short RNA molecules that regulate gene expression, and have been investigated as potential biomarkers because their expression levels are correlated with various diseases. However, detecting microRNAs in the bloodstream remains difficult because current methods are not sufficiently selective or sensitive. Here, we show that a nanopore sensor based on the α-haemolysin protein can selectively detect microRNAs at the single molecular level in plasma samples from lung cancer patients without the need for labels or amplification of the microRNA. The sensor, which uses a programmable oligonucleotide probe to generate a target-specific signature signal, can quantify subpicomolar levels of cancer-associated microRNAs and can distinguish single-nucleotide differences between microRNA family members. This approach is potentially useful for quantitative microRNA detection, the discovery of disease markers and non-invasive early diagnosis of cancer.
abstract_cn: MicroRNA是调节基因表达的短RNA分子，由于其表达水平与各种疾病相关，因此已被研究为潜在的生物标记。 但是，由于目前的方法选择性或敏感性不够，因此检测血液中的microRNA仍然很困难。 在这里，我们表明基于血红素溶血素蛋白的纳米孔传感器可以选择性地检测肺癌患者血浆样品中单分子水平的microRNA，而无需标记或扩增microRNA。 该传感器使用可编程的寡核苷酸探针产生靶标特异性信号，可以量化与癌症相关的microRNA的亚皮摩尔水平，并可以区分microRNA家族成员之间的单核苷酸差异。 该方法可能对定量微小RNA检测，疾病标志物的发现和癌症的非侵入性早期诊断有用。</ p>

title: A multifunctional core–shell nanoparticle for dendritic cell-based cancer immunotherapy
title_cn: 多功能核壳纳米粒子，用于基于树突细胞的癌症免疫治疗
abstract: Dendritic cell-based cancer immunotherapy requires tumour antigens to be delivered efficiently into dendritic cells and their migration to be monitored in vivo. Nanoparticles have been explored as carriers for antigen delivery, but applications have been limited by the toxicity of the solvents used to make nanoparticles, and by the need to use transfection agents to deliver nanoparticles into cells. Here we show that an iron oxide–zinc oxide core–shell nanoparticle can deliver carcinoembryonic antigen into dendritic cells while simultaneously acting as an imaging agent. The nanoparticle–antigen complex is efficiently taken up by dendritic cells within one hour and can be detected in vitro by confocal microscopy and in vivo by magnetic resonance imaging. Mice immunized with dendritic cells containing the nanoparticle–antigen complex showed enhanced tumour antigen specific T-cell responses, delayed tumour growth and better survival than controls.
abstract_cn: 基于树突细胞的癌症免疫疗法需要将肿瘤抗原有效地传递到树突细胞中，并在体内对其迁移进行监测。 已经研究了纳米颗粒作为用于抗原递送的载体，但是其应用受到用于制备纳米颗粒的溶剂的毒性以及需要使用转染剂将纳米颗粒递送到细胞中的限制。 在这里，我们显示出氧化铁和氧化锌核壳纳米粒子可以将癌胚抗原递送到树突状细胞中，同时充当成像剂。 纳米粒子抗原复合物可在一小时内被树突状细胞有效吸收，并可通过共聚焦显微镜在体外进行检测，并在体内通过磁共振成像进行检测。 用含有纳米抗原复合物的树突状细胞免疫的小鼠显示出增强的肿瘤抗原特异性T细胞反应，延迟的肿瘤生长和比对照组更好的存活率。
